column4: Uh, so, I just re-installed Ubuntu 9.10 Desktop on my Macbook 5-1 (aluminum unibody). For some reason, https://help.ubuntu.com/community <- this page is showing up in spanish. I've tried restarting my computer, clearing the cache, uninstalling firefox,
you just reinstalled?  try making a new user and see if they are spanish too
well you can just view the previous page for now
